actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from GSA, OMB, Interior Department.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to convey certain land situated in Miami Beach, Florida, to the City of Miami Beach, Florida for park and recreational purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of General Services to convey certain Federal land situated in Miami Beach, Florida, to the city of Miami Beach, for park and recreational purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to convey certain land situated in Miami Beach, Florida, to the City of Miami Beach, Florida for park and recreational purposes.
